item.title: Tracing a Ruby application with OpenTelemetry for performance monitoring
item.description: OpenTelemetryâ€™s Ruby client libraries can be used to trace Ruby applications for performance monitoring. In this tutorial, we will auto-instrument a sample Ruby app with OpenTelemetry to collect tracing data and then visualize it using SigNoz...
